title: Instructional Design Workshop for Dental Education Curriculum Reform [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Dental education experience and foundational knowledge of instructional design
context.additional_context: A situation requiring instructor engagement and innovative pedagogical approaches for dental education curriculum reform, necessitating the establishment of a digital device-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Participants can explain the necessity and direction of dental education curriculum reform
Participants can propose curriculum reform plans utilizing instructional design principles
Participants can analyze peer instructors' needs through surveys and incorporate findings into reform strategies
Participants can design project-based assessments to measure learner performance
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
